titleStmt.title: Loves mistresse or Natures rarity. To a most excellent delicious new tune, called, Tell me you wandring spirits in the aire.
titleStmt.author: S., S.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Grove on Snow-hill.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Tell me you wandering spirits in the aire ..."
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
